description:
Kyou has a cold and a fever, and Asu is nursing her. A few days later, Kyou can go back to work and tries to do her best as to gain back the sick days. But when Kyou finally returns from her newspaper run, there`s no light in the sister`s room - and she finds Asu collapsed at the ground!
Panicking, Kyou tries to carry Asu to the hospital, but the owner convinces her to call the ambulance instead. Kyou becomes even more worried now, as she remembers the days when their mother died in the hospital.

titles.title: A Day of Colds, Promises and Mother
Kaze to Yakusoku to Okaasan no Hi
Um dia de resfriados, promessas e mãe
風邪と約束とお母さんの日
